guardvillagers.advancements.adventure.re: Give a sword to an unemployed villager to help defend the village
We Want You, as a New Recruit!
guardvillagers.config.cleric: Allow clerics to heal players and villagers?
guardvillagers.configuration.Have baby v: Have baby villagers have big heads like in bedrock?
guardvillagers.config.range: This is the range in which the guards will be aggroed to mobs that are attacking villagers.
guardvillagers.config.RaidAnimals: Allow raiders to attack farm animals during raids?
guardvillagers.config.IllagersRunFromPol: Allow Illagers to run from polar bears
guardvillagers.config.armorvillager: Allow armorers and weaponsmiths repair guard items when down below half durability?
guardvillagers.config.hotvPatrolPoint: Require hero of the village for guards to patrol areas
guardvillagers.config.hotv: This will make it so villagers will only be converted into guards if the player has hero of the village
guardvillagers.config.blacksmith: Allow blacksmiths to repair Iron Golems below 80 health
guardvillagers.config.GuardFormation: Enable shield guards to stay close together in combat
guardvillagers.configuration.Allow guard: .Allow guards to naturally patrol villages? This feature can cause lag if a lot of guards are spawned
guardvillagers.config.guardArrows: Allow guard arrows to hit villager-like mobs?
guardvillagers.config.AttackAllMobs: Allow guards to attack all mobs
guardvillagers.config.VillagersRunFromPo: Allow villagers to run from polar bears?
guardvillagers.configuration.Allow guard: Allow guards to teleport if following the player
guardvillagers.configuration.Have guards: Have guards randomly spawn with biome variants?
guardvillagers.config.FriendlyFire: Have guards attempt to avoid firing into other friendly mobs?
guardvillagers.configuration.How low of: How low of a reputation of a player should have to be instantly aggroed upon by guards and golems?
guardvillagers.configuration.Mob Whiteli: Whitelist of mobs for guards to attack
guardvillagers.configuration.Have guards: Have guards only follow the player if they have hero of the village?
guardvillagers.configuration.Minimum rep: Minimum reputation requirement for guards to give you access to their inventories
guardvillagers.config.GuardRaiseShield: Allow guards to permanently raise their shields?
guardvillagers.configuration.Allow Iron: Allow Iron Golems to float on water?
guardvillagers.config.hotvArmor: Allow players to give guards stuff only if they have the hero of the village effect?
guardvillagers.config.multifollow: Allow the player to right click on bells to mass order guards to follow them?
guardvillagers.configuration.How many gu: How many guards should spawn in a village?
guardvillagers.configuration.Allow guard: Allow guards to convert to zombie villagers upon being killed by zombies?
guardvillagers.configuration.Chance for: Chance for guards to lose durability
guardvillagers.configuration.How many ti: How many times a villager can heal a guard's equipment in one day
How many times a cleric can heal a guard in one day
guardvillagers.configuration.Profession: Profession Whitelist for guard weaponry repair ai
guardvillagers.configuration.How many ti: How many times a smith villager can heal a golem in one day
guardvillagers.configuration.Profession: Profession Whitelist for healing ai for clerics
Profession Whitelist for golem repair ai
guardvillagers.configuration.Mobs that g: Mobs that guards actively protect when they get hurt
guardvillagers.configuration.Angle of ho: Angle of how ranged guards determine if a friendly mob is infront of them before firing
guardvillagers.configuration.Depth value: Depth value for guards fighting underwater mobs
guardvillagers.configuration.Allow guard: Allow guards to sink temporarily to fight mobs that are under water?
guardvillagers.configuration.Mobs that g: Mobs that guards actively protect when they get targeted
